mapper.select: SELECT ID, UUID, Location, Up, Views, Tag, Title, Content, Inserted, Updated FROM Please Order By ID DESC
SELECT ID, UUID, Location, Up, Views, Tag, Title, Content, Inserted, Updated FROM Please WHERE ID = #{ID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Please (UUID, Location, Up, Views, Tag, Title, Content, Inserted, Updated) VALUES (#{UUID}, #{Location}, #{Up}, #{Views}, #{Tag}, #{Title}, #{Content}, #{Inserted}, #{Updated})
mapper.update: UPDATE Please SET UUID = #{UUID}, Location = #{Location}, Up = #{Up}, Views = #{Views}, Tag = #{Tag}, Title = #{Title}, Content = #{Content}, updated = NOW() WHERE ID = #{ID}
